description.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Facilities Planning is responsible for improving school and district office facilities. They manage external contractors building new facilities or renovating existing facilities. As part of this, they oversee public communication and bond funds for facilities projects.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
